```{r}
source("utils_causal_structures.R", encoding = "UTF-8")
```

```{r}
res <- make_datasets()

datasets <- list(
  "M" = res[[1]]$df,
  "F" = res[[2]]$df,
  "C" = res[[3]]$df,
  "T" = res[[4]]$df
)
```

```{r}
for (name in names(datasets)) {
  cat("## Dataset", name, "\n")
  print(datasets[[name]])
  cat("\n\n")
}
```

```{r}
for (name in names(datasets)) {
  cat("## Dataset", name, "\n")
  print(datasets[[name]] %>% cor())
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
